system.description:
You have turned your psionic ability towards not only projecting emotions on others, nut enhancing your own personal combat ability.  You gain the following benefits:

  • You learn an additional Awakened Mind maneuver that does not count against your maximum number of maneuvers known, and when learning Awakened Mind maneuvers from either class you may add your esper level to your berserker level to your berserker level to determine the maximum degree of Awakened Mind maneuver you may learn.
  • While raging your furious critical DC increases by an amount equal to your Intelligence modifier.
  • If you have the Extra Attack feature from both the Esper and Berserker classes you may use intelligence in place of strength for ranged and melee weapon attacks and your weapon attacks deal an additional 1d4 psychic damage while raging.
system.prerequisite: Nexus of Psionic Fury feat and Psychic Warrior archetype
